verses.verse: And after <WH310> Abimelech <WH40> there arose <WH6965> <WH8799> to defend <WH3467> <WH8687> Yisra'EL <WH3478> Tola <WH8439> the son <WH1121> of Puah <WH6312>, the son <WH1121> of Dodo <WH1734>, a man <WH376> of Yissakhar <WH3485>; and he dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in Shamir <WH8069> in mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669>.
And he judged <WH8199> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478> twenty <WH6242> and three <WH7969> years <WH8141>, and died <WH4191> <WH8799>, and was buried <WH6912> <WH8735> in Shamir <WH8069>.
And after <WH310> him arose <WH6965> <WH8799> Jair <WH2971>, a Gil`adi <WH1569>, and judged <WH8199> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478> twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> years <WH8141>.

And he had thirty <WH7970> sons <WH1121> that rode <WH7392> <WH8802> on thirty <WH7970> ass colts <WH5895>, and they had thirty <WH7970> cities <WH5892>, which are called <WH7121> <WH8799> Havothjair <WH2334> unto this day <WH3117>, which are in the land <WH776> of Gil`ad <WH1568>.
And Jair <WH2971> died <WH4191> <WH8799>, and was buried <WH6912> <WH8735> in Camon <WH7056>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> did <WH6213> <WH8800> evil <WH7451> again <WH3254> <WH8686> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>, and served <WH5647> <WH8799> Baalim <WH1168>, and Ashtaroth <WH6252>, and the 'elohim <WH430> of Syria <WH758>, and the 'elohim <WH430> of Zidon <WH6721>, and the 'elohim <WH430> of Moab <WH4124>, and the 'elohim <WH430> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, and the 'elohim <WH430> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and forsook <WH5800> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>, and served <WH5647> <WH8804> not him.

And the anger <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> was hot <WH2734> <WH8799> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and he sold <WH4376> <WH8799> them into the hands <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and into the hands <WH3027> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>.

And that year <WH8141> they vexed <WH7492> <WH8799> and oppressed <WH7533> <WH8779> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: eighteen <WH8083> <WH6240> years <WH8141>, all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> that were on the other side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383> in the land <WH776> of the Amorites <WH567>, which is in Gil`ad <WH1568>.

Moreover the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> passed over <WH5674> <WH8799> Yarden <WH3383> to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> also against Y'hudah <WH3063>, and against Binyamin <WH1144>, and against the house <WH1004> of Efrayim <WH669>; so that Yisra'EL <WH3478> was sore <WH3966> distressed <WH3334> <WH8799>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> cried <WH2199> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, We have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> against thee, both because we have forsaken <WH5800> <WH8804> our 'Elohim <WH430>, and also served <WH5647> <WH8799> Baalim <WH1168>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Did not I deliver you from the Egyptians <WH4714>, and from the Amorites <WH567>, from the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, and from the Philistines <WH6430> ?

The Zidonians <WH6722> also, and the Amalekites <WH6002>, and the Maonites <WH4584>, did oppress <WH3905> <WH8804> you; and ye cried <WH6817> <WH8799> to me, and I delivered <WH3467> <WH8686> you out of their hand <WH3027>.
Yet ye have forsaken <WH5800> <WH8804> me, and served <WH5647> <WH8799> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>: wherefore I will deliver <WH3467> <WH8687> you no more <WH3254> <WH8686>.

Go <WH3212> <WH8798> and cry <WH2199> <WH8798> unto the 'elohim <WH430> which ye have chosen <WH977> <WH8804>; let them <WH1992> deliver <WH3467> <WH8686> you in the time <WH6256> of your tribulation <WH6869>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, We have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>: do <WH6213> <WH8798> thou unto us whatsoever seemeth <WH5869> good <WH2896> unto thee; deliver <WH5337> <WH8685> us only, we pray thee, this day <WH3117>.

And they put away <WH5493> <WH8686> the strange <WH5236> 'elohim <WH430> from among <WH7130> them, and served <WH5647> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>: and his soul <WH5315> was grieved <WH7114> <WH8799> for the misery <WH5999> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

Then the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> were gathered together <WH6817> <WH8735>, and encamped <WH2583> <WH8799> in Gil`ad <WH1568>. And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> assembled themselves together <WH622> <WH8735>, and encamped <WH2583> <WH8799> in Mizpeh <WH4709>.

And the people <WH5971> and princes <WH8269> of Gil`ad <WH1568> said <WH559> <WH8799> one <WH376> to another <WH7453>, What man <WH376> is he that will begin <WH2490> <WH8686> to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> against the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>? he shall be head <WH7218> over all the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Gil`ad <WH1568>.
